page.title: 08SINFIN MOOR CHURCH
page.content: The church was opened in 1976.The architect was D.J.Montague.Farmer and Ball were the builders.The church welcomes a variety of Religions, notably, Church of England,Methodist and United Reformed.They have a team of four ministers.The cross in the church is made of beaten copper. Services are held at 10.00 on Sundays with a congregation of 200 people. Services were first held at the home of the first minister Rev.Orchards. Then two other houses were used until the church building was completed.The church building is not only used for church services but also used by the cubs,guides and play school which use other rooms in this modern building. The church plays a large part in the local community organising coffee mornings,jumble sales and other activities. BY PAUL,SEAN AND MARK
